author: stefan2
msg: (create_repos): Use the server version provided instead of the global one.

author: stefan2
msg: Make pre-cooked greek repositories work with svnserve (and probably mod_dav).
The main problem is authz configuration etc. that can't be taken generically
from a pre-packaged repo template but depends on test settings.
(_post_create_repos): New repository setup function. The code is 100%
(unpack_greek_repos): Post-process the repo according to the current
(create_repos): Call the new function that contains the rest of the code.
